117

Growing scattered from moss-covered compacted soil (trail) in open mixed oak woodland near Northern Red Oak, Bur Oak, Chinkapin Oak, and Elm trees. 

3-3.5cm tall with a cap width of 2cm. 

- Smell reminiscent of phenolic chemicals or chlorine. 
- Taste mild and indistinct.
